I think the UX could be improved by adding a third indicator, similar to a traffic-light system. Instead of just green for veg and red for non-veg, you could introduce yellow for egg-based items, where the category isn’t clearly defined. Sometimes I’m specifically looking for food that contains egg, but I end up having to sift through a huge list of non-veg options to find it. A dedicated indicator would make this much quicker and more intuitiv
